subject: New York City Marathon
Exercise
lead_paragraph: If you put the treadmill at your local gym to the top speed (12 miles per hour) and kept that up for 26.2 miles, that time would have only been good enough for fifth place in the New York City Marathon.
snippet: If you put the treadmill at your local gym to the top speed (12 miles per hour) and kept that up for 26.2 miles, that time would have only been good enough for fifth place in the New York City Marathon.
